title: Peter Thomas - Chariots Of The Gods
description:
Here is a Limited Archival Pressing of the Soundtrack to Erich Von Daniken&#039;s Chariots Of The Gods. Music is by the Peter Thomas Sound Orchestra. The disc contains 19 tracks of fantastic score music.

1. Reminiscences of the Future (Theme from Chariots of the Gods)
2. Valley of the Gods
3. Popular Myth and Destruction of Sodom
4. Chicken Itza: Temple of the Virgins
5. The Bible: Book of Ezekiel
6. The red sea
7. The Obelisk of Karnak
8. Stars and Rockets
9. Gods from Strange Planets
10. Returning to the Stars
11. Rocket Science
12. Tula: Monumental Sculptures
13. Cult Music and Mussel Horn
14. The Pyramid of Cholula (Theme from Chariots of the Gods)
15. Lake Titicaca
16. Wondina Came from Heaven to the Mortals
17. Easter Island
18. Anger and Promise
19. The Flying God from Palenque (Finale-Chariots of the Gods)

Bitrate is 320
Released: 1970
